metadata.description: Composable, interoperable plugins for Claude. This marketplace hosts a variety of plugins that can be easily integrated into your Claude experience, enhancing its capabilities and allowing for seamless interaction with external tools and services.

plugins.name: auto-dev
plugins.description: Autonomous development loop â€” brainstorm-only mode, feature-scoped and project-scoped iteration, configurable autonomy. Spawns fresh agents per iteration to avoid context poisoning.

plugins.name: superclaude
plugins.description: A plugin that enhances Claude's capabilities by providing additional tools and functionalities. It allows for seamless integration with external services and APIs, enabling Claude to perform a wider range of tasks and interact with various platforms.
